title: Waitress
body:
<<if !visited("Waitress.TakeGold")>>
    Excuse me?
    Could you maybe run a small errand for me.
<<endif>>
-> yes? <<if !visited("Waitress.TakeGold")>>
    [[Waitress.AskForGold]]
-> do you have any pie? <<if visited("Mother") && !visited("Waitress.GivePie")>>
    [[Waitress.GetAskedForPie]]
-> Your new Mailman is here! <<if visited("Postperson.AskForPost") && !visited("Waitress.GivePost")>>
    [[Waitress.GivePost]]
Yes hello?
You don't seem to have the money or prestige to help me out.
So if you don't want anything you can go now.

title: Waitress.AskForGold
body:
You see, I am a changed woman! And what does a changed woman need?
Right. Riches! I am in dire need of riches!
-> The people are dying of hunger!
    Who cares about them really?
    Do I look like the local baker? Not anymore!
    My only interest now is gold.
    But my gold has to be unique. Something the market hasn't seen to this day!
    I know what I need!
    I'm gonna use my cake tins to mold the gold. Noone has seen golden pie on this island before!
    Oh, it's gonna be marvellous.
    All I'm missing is the gold. Would you be a dear and bring me some?
    There are some boulders with gold veins in them. Somewhere on the west side of the island.
    Just smash them, would you?
    -> If it helps you...
        Thank you so much darling.
        This will surely be the best deed you ever did.
    -> I can't support your priorities
        Pah. Then act like the cursed plebs you are.
        Or come back when you've come to your senses.
-> I found some gold for you. <<if $gold>>
    [[Waitress.TakeGold]]

title: Waitress.TakeGold
body:
Oh thank you so much dearest.
This will surely make me the best.
But when I start with a simgle pie, why stop?
I can open a jewelery!
I can sell gold pie to everyone!
I can produce gold pie for the masses.
And if everyone is so hungry, let them eat golden cake.

title: Waitress.GetAskedForPie
body:
<<if visited("Waitress.TakeGold")>>
    [[Waitress.GivePie]]
<<else>>
    No, of course not.
    Why would be interrested in that?
    Have you seen the stock market price of pie lately?
    Gold is where it's at!
    Go fetch me some and maybe we can talk about pie.
<<endif>>

title: Waitress.GivePie
body:
Of course I do!
And you can be the first customer of my new line of cake jewerly.
Let me get the piece quickly.
This is a depiction of a pear pie, doesn't it look lovely?
100% pure gold.
You can have it, if you want a second piece it will cost you a arm and a leg obviously.
Now go and use it to get your muse.

title: Waitress.GivePost
body:
Oh? How charming!
You do your new job so well.
Take this letter addressed to my grandmother.
She keeps sending me recipies as if that's worth anything today.
Gold is where it's at today.
